original: Boden, Lars Joel, ingenjör, Åmål, f. 27/11/93 i Skog, Gävleb. 1, av pred. Lars B. o. Karin f. Bodén. G. 18 m. Elin Widén. Barn: Sture f. 19, Margareta 24. — Tekn. elemisk. i Örebro 14. Stud:res. i Tyskl. 31, 38, Schweiz 46. Rit. v. B T 16-19, ing:el. v. ST 19-20, verkst :ing. v. BJ 20-22, förste verkst :ing. där i Åmål fr. 23. Led. av stadsfullm. i Åmål o. av drätselkamm.
translated: Boden, Lars Joel, engineer, born on November 27th, 1893 in Skog, Gävleborg County, son of preacher Lars B. and Karin (née Bodén). He married Elin Widén in 1918, and they had two children: Sture, born in 1919, and Margareta, born in 1924. He attended the technical secondary school in Örebro in 1914. He traveled to Germany in 1931 and 1938, and to Switzerland in 1946. He was a draftsman at B T from 1916 to 1919, an engineer at ST from 1919 to 1920, a workshop engineer at BJ from 1920 to 1922, and a senior workshop engineer in Åmål from 1923 onward. He was a member of the city council in Åmål and of the finance committee.
